body_html:
@baihualinxin : You are not prefix parameters with '--' use --input_file=path instead of input_file=path.

Also prefer using tflite_convert:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/g3doc/cmdline_examples.md#savedmodel

Prefer using tflite_convert.
tflite_convert
--graph_def_file=/Users/dchealth/Desktop/mobilenet/frozen_graph.pb
--output_file=/Users/dchealth/Desktop/mobilenet/frozen_graphnew.tflite
--input_arrays=input
--output_arrays=MobilenetV1/Predictions/Reshape_1

body:
@baihualinxin : You are not prefix parameters with '--' use --input_file=path instead of input_file=path.

Also prefer using tflite_convert: 
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/g3doc/cmdline_examples.md#savedmodel

Prefer using tflite_convert.
tflite_convert \
      --graph_def_file=/Users/dchealth/Desktop/mobilenet/frozen_graph.pb  \
      --output_file=/Users/dchealth/Desktop/mobilenet/frozen_graphnew.tflite \
      --input_arrays=input \
      --output_arrays=MobilenetV1/Predictions/Reshape_1
